arts.ttl: Michael O’Neill disappointed as Northern Ireland let lead slip in Luxembourg
arts.sum: Northern Ireland still earned promotion from League C in the Nations League.

arts.ttl: O'Neill rues missed NI chances in Luxembourg draw
arts.sum: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill says the 2-2 draw with Luxembourg in the Nations League is a 'little lesson' for his young team.

arts.ttl: 'Little lessons' for NI after Luxembourg draw - O'Neill
arts.sum: Michael O'Neill says his Northern Ireland side will learn from letting a two-goal lead slip in Luxembourg in the Nations League.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland earn Nations League promotion despite draw with Luxembourg
arts.sum: Luxembourg 2-2 Northern Ireland: Michael O’Neill’s side let a two-goal lead slip but still secured promotion as winners of Group 3C

arts.ttl: How to watch Luxembourg vs Northern Ireland: TV channel and live stream for Nations League game today
arts.sum: The visitors are in control of their own destiny in Group C3

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland captain detail four key elements behind rapid rise under Michael O'Neill
arts.sum: Northern Ireland need just a point against Luxembourg to top their Nations League group and they have won six and drawn two of their last 10 games

arts.ttl: Michael O’Neill expects tough test for Northern Ireland in Luxembourg
arts.sum: Northern Ireland can win Group C and secure promotion with a draw in the Nations League clash.

arts.ttl: 'It was like a bad date' - Michael O'Neill on one of Northern Ireland's biggest lows
arts.sum: Michael O'Neill's side can win their Nations League Group against Luxembourg and he has recalled embarrassingly losing to the minnows in 2013

arts.ttl: 5 talking points as Northern Ireland end Nations League campaign in Luxembourg
arts.sum: The PA news agency looks at the key talking points head of Monday’s game.
